name: Tank RTS Local Multiplayer
description:
Click the host button to enter lobby as Host and to connect as client Press on "Find Servers" button on top left. You need to be on the same wifi network or locally connected.

Tip: To connect two PC on same wifi network, connect the host computer to a wifi network with an internet connection, then click on the wifi button on host pc, you'll see a "Mobile hotspot" button besides "Airplane Mode", click on it. And Finally on the client PC connect to this network.
